creator: markt@apache.org
text:
If a PEM file is provided containing the certificate and the associated chain the server only presents the final certificate in the chain.

The option to provide the chain appears to have been removed and needs to be restored.

creator: remm@apache.org
text: Restoring the property worked for me (tested with the test cert and a chain with APR and OpenSSL).

creator: ognjen.d.blagojevic@gmail.com
text: I rechecked with my certificate and it returns the full chain. I'm closing this issue.
